name: MountainSound
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mountain sound
Developer Terms of Use
des:
• MOUNTAIN SOUND •
Mountain Sound is an Alexa skill designed to help you unwind and de-stress whenever you need it. With a wide range of calming sounds, including nature sounds, white noise, and ambient music, you can find the perfect soundscape to suit your mood. Whether you're trying to meditate, focus, or simply escape from the distractions of daily life.

• FUNCTIONALITIES AND PREMIUM EDITION •
You can say "Alexa, open Mountain Sound" to reproduce relaxing audio tracks that will help you sleep better. 

You can also say "Alexa, activate premium" to activate the Premium Edition!

The PREMIUM EDITION includes: 
- More and longer audio tracks.
- Higher quality audio.
- No interruptions.

• ALEXA ROUTINES •
To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:
- Enable this Alexa skill.
- On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
- Click + to add a new routine.
- Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
- Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
- Choose "Your Skills".
- Select this skill.
- Click Next.
- Choose Device to perform the routine to.
- Click Save.

• THANK YOU! •
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
